quotes.quote: Television is more interesting than people. If it were not, we would have people standing in the corners of our rooms.
quotes.author: Alan Corenk

quotes.quote: Seeing a murder on television... can help work off one's antagonisms. And if you haven't any antagonisms, the commercials will give you some.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.quote: Television has done much for psychiatry by spreading information about it, as well as contributing to the need for it.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.quote: Television has proved that people will look at anything rather than each other.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Television is the first truly democratic culture - the first culture available to everybody and entirely governed by what the people want. The most terrifying thing is what people do want.
quotes.author: Clive Barnes

quotes.quote: The one function TV news performs very well is that when there is no news we give it to you with the same emphasis as if there were.
quotes.author: David Brinkley

quotes.quote: Television enables you to be entertained in your home by people you wouldn't have in your home.
quotes.author: David Frost

quotes.quote: [The television is] an invention that permits you to be entertained in your living room by people you wouldn't have in your home.
quotes.author: David Frost

quotes.quote: MTV is the lava lamp of the 1980's.
quotes.author: Doug Ferrari

quotes.quote: I can think of nothing more boring for the American people than to have to sit in their living rooms for a whole half hour looking at my face on their television screens.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Dealing with network executives is like being nibbled to death by ducks.
quotes.author: Eric Sevareid

quotes.quote: TV is chewing gum for the eyes.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: Imitation is the sincerest form of television.
quotes.author: Fred Allen

quotes.quote: Television is a new medium. It's called a medium because nothing is well-done.
quotes.author: Fred Allen

quotes.quote: [Television is] the triumph of machine over people.
quotes.author: Fred Allen

quotes.quote: The great thing about television is that if something important happens anywhere in the world, day or night, you can always change the channel.
quotes.author: From "Taxi"

quotes.quote: Don't you wish there was a knob on the TV to turn up the intelligence? There's one marked 'Brightness,' but it doesn't work.
quotes.author: Gallagher

quotes.quote: I find television very educating. Every time somebody turns on the set, I go into the other room and read a book.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Television news is like a lightning flash. It makes a loud noise, lights up everything around it, leaves everything else in darkness and then is suddenly gone.
quotes.author: Hodding Carter

quotes.quote: If it weren't for Philo T. Farnsworth, inventor of television, we'd still be eating frozen radio dinners.
quotes.author: Johnny Carson

quotes.quote: One of the few good things about modern times: If you die horribly on television, you will not have died in vain. You will have entertained us.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Thanks to TV and for the convenience of TV, you can only be one of two kinds of human beings, either a liberal or a conservative.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: If there's anything unsettling to the stomach, it's watching actors on television talk about their personal lives.
quotes.author: Marlon Brando

quotes.quote: Imagine what it would be like if TV actually were good. It would be the end of everything we know.
quotes.author: Marvin Minsky

quotes.quote: Television is for appearing on - not for looking at.
quotes.author: Noel Coward

quotes.quote: My father hated radio and could not wait for television to be invented so he could hate that too.
quotes.author: Peter De Vries

quotes.quote: All television is children's television.
quotes.author: Richard P. Adler

quotes.quote: It is difficult to produce a television documentary that is both incisive and probing when every twelve minutes one is interrupted by twelve dancing rabbits singing about toilet paper.
quotes.author: Rod Serling

quotes.quote: Television has raised writing to a new low.
quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.quote: I think that parents only get so offended by television because they rely on it as a babysitter and the sole educator of their kids.
quotes.author: Trey Parker and Matt Stone
